005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Collections;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-reverse">array:reverse</a>
028 * function.
029 */
030public final class ArrayReverse {
031  private static final String NAME = "reverse";
032  @NonNull
033  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
034      .name(NAME)
035      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
036      .deterministic()
037      .contextIndependent()
038      .focusIndependent()
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("array")
041          .type(IArrayItem.class)
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
045      .returnOne()
046      .functionHandler(ArrayReverse::execute)
047      .build();
048
049  private ArrayReverse() {
050    // disable construction
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
054  @NonNull
055  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
056      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
057      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
058      IItem focus) {
059    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
060        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
061
062    return ISequence.of(reverse(array));
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
067   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-reverse">array:reverse</a>.
068   *
069   * @param <T>
070   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
071   * @param array
072   *          the target Metapath array
073   * @return a new array containing the modification
074   */
075  @NonNull
076  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> reverse(
077      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array) {
078    List<T> copy = new ArrayList<>(array);
079    Collections.reverse(copy);
080    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(copy);
081  }
082}
